comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly Dom J.M. Cardoso de Oliveira, Brazilian Minister to Mexico in 1915. See NYT of Sept 4, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0B13FB3A5C1373... If so, he would be: Oliveira, J. M. Cardoso de -- (José Manuel Cardoso), -- 1865-1962. The age seems about right. Also at pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cardoso_de_Oliveira

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: swanq: It does seem probable that this is Cardoso de Oliveira, Brazilian Minister to Mexico in 1915. We will add more details to the description when we update.
